item.title: Categories
item.description: Categories # Assignments (80%) # We have 5 big assignments in total (subject to change). Visit this course’s Canvas and Gradescope site for the assignment documents. See the course schedule for deliverable due dates. [10%] HW1: Week 1 to Week 2 topics [15%] HW2: Week 3 to Week 4 topics [20%] HW3: Week 5 to Week 6 topics [20%] HW4: Week 7 to Week 11 topics [15%] HW5: Week 12 to Week 13 topics We do not release solutions for homework.
